title: Bug 124610: Add a filter on a boolean computed column will cause error.
OB: When adding a filter on a boolean computed column, an error occurs.
EB: When adding a filter on a boolean computed column, the filter should work correctly without any errors.
SR:
1. Open the software and navigate to the computed column section.
2. Create a boolean computed column.
3. Add a filter on the computed column.
4. Save the changes.
5. Preview the results.
6. Verify that the filter works correctly without any errors.
